name: The Legend of Link Ruby Collector: Spooky Edition.
name_original: The Legend of Link Ruby Collector: Spooky Edition.
description:
The Legend of Link Ruby Collector: Spooky Edition. is a game developed by igdadelphi. It was originally released in 2016.
You can play The Legend of Link Ruby Collector: Spooky Edition. on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
